error._primary: This addressbook could not be opened.
error._secondary: This addressbook server might be unreachable or the server name may be misspelled or your network connection could be down.

error._primary: Failed to authenticate with LDAP server.
error._secondary: Check to make sure your password is spelled correctly and that you are using a supported login method. Remember that many passwords are case sensitive; your caps lock might be on.

error._primary: This addressbook server does not have any suggested search bases.
error._secondary: This LDAP server may use an older version of LDAP, which does not support this functionality or it may be misconfigured. Ask your administrator for supported search bases.

error._primary: This server does not support LDAPv3 schema information.
Could not get schema information for LDAP server.
LDAP server did not respond with valid schema information.

error._secondary: This address book will be removed permanently.

error._primary: Would you like to save your changes?
error._secondary: You have made modifications to this contact. Do you want to save these changes?
You are attempting to move a contact from one addressbook to another but it cannot be removed from the source. Do you want to save a copy instead?

error._primary: The image you have selected is large. Do you want to resize and store it?
The Evolution addressbook has quit unexpectedly.
error._secondary: Your contacts for {0} will not be available until Evolution is restarted.
A contact already exists with this address. Would you like to add a new card with the same address anyway?

error._primary: Some features may not work properly with your current server
error._secondary: You are connecting to an unsupported GroupWise server and may encounter problems using Evolution. For best results the server should be upgraded to a supported version
